Looking for a Kia Optima near Washington?

The Kia Optima offers a choice of three powerful and efficient powertrains complement a feature-rich and stylish sedan. With prices starting at just over $22,000 for the base LX and ranging up to about $31,000 for the turbocharged SX, the Optima offers something at every price point. With the largest selection of cars from dealers and private sellers, Autotrader can help find the perfect Optima for you.

Autotrader has 121 Kia Optimas for sale near Washington, DC, including a Used 2006 Kia Optima, a Used 2006 Kia Optima EX, and a Used 2006 Kia Optima LX.

Not sure if an Optima is the right fit for you?

That's okay! We make it easy to shop for your next vehicle by body type, mileage, price, and much more.You can find other popular Kia vehicles such as Niro, Forte, and Telluride on Autotrader.
